customrecordcustomfield.help: Select the subsidiary / company that you want to register
customrecordcustomfield.label: Company

customrecordcustomfield.help: This is the subsidiary's legal name, which has already been registered on NetSuite. It must be the name as incorporated/registered.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Registered Company Name

customrecordcustomfield.help: This is the company or subsidiary's preferred currency, which has already been registered on NetSuite.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Base Currency

customrecordcustomfield.help: Select a person to be the main contact.
customrecordcustomfield.label: MAIN CONTACT NAME

customrecordcustomfield.help: This is the main contact's email address, which has already been registered on NetSuite. We'll send any alerts or notifications to this person.
customrecordcustomfield.label: MAIN CONTACT EMAIL

customrecordcustomfield.help: Please provide a contact number for the main contact.
customrecordcustomfield.label: MAIN CONTACT MOBILE

customrecordcustomfield.description: Create and process Invoice Payment request
customrecordcustomfield.help: Check this box if you want to use Bill Payments.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Bill Payment

customrecordcustomfield.help: With Trade Working Capital Loans, you can apply for a loan to cover any bills due for payment directly from NetSuite. Applications are quick and there's no need to upload any documents.
customrecordcustomfield.label: TWC LOANS

customrecordcustomfield.help: This is your unique ID number that lets you connect to HSBC services. If you need more information, take a look at our user guide or contact your Relationship Manager or Business Development Manager.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Client ID

customrecordcustomfield.help: This is your unique password that lets you connect to HSBC services. If you need more information, take a look at our user guide or contact your Relationship Manager or Business Development Manager.
customrecordcustomfield.label: CLIENT SECRET

customrecordcustomfield.help: This is your unique ID number that lets you connect to HSBC services. If you need more information, take a look at our user guide or contact your Relationship Manager or Business Development Manager.
customrecordcustomfield.label: CLIENT PROFILE ID

customrecordcustomfield.help: This is the private key of your self generated PGP public/private key pair. You'll need to share the public key with HSBC to complete your registration. If you need more help with this, take a look at our user guide or contact your Relationship Manager or Business Development Manager
customrecordcustomfield.label: PGP PRIVATE KEY

customrecordcustomfield.help: This is the key pass phrase of your self generated PGP public/private key pair. If you need more help with this, take a look at our user guide or contact your Relationship Manager or Business Development Manager.
customrecordcustomfield.label: PGP Private Key Passphrase

customrecordcustomfield.help: With Trade Working Capital Loans, you can apply for loan to cover any bills due for payment directly from NetSuite. Applications are quick and there's no need to upload any documents.
customrecordcustomfield.label: TWC Buyer Loan

customrecordcustomfield.help: With Trade Working Capital Loans, you can apply for loan to cover any invoices due for payment directly from NetSuite. Applications are quick and there's no need to upload any documents.
customrecordcustomfield.label: TWC Seller Loan

customrecordcustomfield.help: This is your unique client ID number that lets you connect to HSBC services. If you need more information, take a look at our user guide or contact your Relationship Manager or Business Development Manager.
customrecordcustomfield.label: TWC CLIENT PROFILE ID

customrecordcustomfield.help: This is the private key of your self generated PGP public/private key pair. You'll need to share the public key with HSBC to complete your registration. If you need more help with this, take a look at our user guide or contact your Relationship Manager or Business Development Manager
customrecordcustomfield.label: TWC PGP PRIVATE KEY

customrecordcustomfield.help: This is the key pass phrase of your self generated PGP public/private key pair. If you need more help with this, take a look at our user guide or contact your Relationship Manager or Business Development Manager.
customrecordcustomfield.label: TWC PGP PUBLIC KEY ID

customrecordcustomfield.label: Client Private Key Hidden

customrecordcustomfield.help: This is the private key of your self generated RSA public/private key pair. You'll need to share the public key with HSBC to complete your registration. If you need more help with this, take a look at our user guide or contact your Relationship Manager or Business Development Manager
customrecordcustomfield.label: RSA Private Key

customrecordcustomfield.help: This is the key pass phrase of your self generated RSA public/private key pair. If you need more help with this, take a look at our user guide or contact your Relationship Manager or Business Development Manager.
customrecordcustomfield.label: RSA Private Key Passphrase
GTRF PGP RSA Private Key String
GLCM PGP Client Private Key Unit 8 Array

customrecordcustomfield.defaultvalue:
Data Access allows HSBC direct access to financial and other information held in Oracle NetSuite, to support the provision of Trade Services to the Customer.
By checking this box, you fully authorise HSBC to access such information held on or via Oracle NetSuite and you confirm that you have read, understood, and accept the Terms and Conditions which can be accessed and read here. You can revoke this access at any time by going to the HSBC site on Oracle NetSuite and under Preferences unticking the box for Data Access.
customrecordcustomfield.label: FHM Description Text
